Interface CustomerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerService
public interface CustomerInterface
The `CustomerInterface` defines the business operations and logic available to a customer in the FlipFit system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    bookSlot(int userId, String gymId, String slotId, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)

    Cancels an existing booking.

  • Method Details

    • viewAllGymCenters

      List<FlipFitGym> viewAllGymCenters(String city)
      Retrieves a list of all gym centers available in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city for which to view gym centers.
      Returns:
      A list of `FlipFitGym` objects located in the specified city.

    • viewAllFreeSlots

      List<Slot> viewAllFreeSlots(String gymId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves a list of all free slots for a specific gym on a given date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym.
      date - The date for which to check free slots.
      Returns:
      A list of available `Slot` objects.

    • viewAllBookings

      List<Booking> viewAllBookings(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of all bookings made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of `Booking` objects for the specified user.

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(int userId, String gymId, String slotId, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Books a specific slot for a user at a gym.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user making the booking.
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym.
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to be booked.
      date - The date of the booking.
      time - The time of the booking.
      Returns:
      `true` if the slot was booked successfully, `false` otherwise.

    • cancelSlot

      boolean cancelSlot(String bookingId)
      Cancels an existing booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The unique ID of the booking to be cancelled.
      Returns:
      `true` if the booking was cancelled successfully, `false` otherwise.

    • checkValidCustomer

      boolean checkValidCustomer(String userName, String password)
      Checks if the provided credentials belong to a valid customer.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username to validate.
      password - The password to validate.
      Returns:
      `true` if the credentials are valid, `false` otherwise.

    • registerCustomer

      Customer registerCustomer(String userName, String password, String email, String phoneNo, String customerCity)
      Registers a new customer with the system.
      Parameters:
      userName - The desired username.
      password - The password for the new account.
      email - The customer's email address.
      phoneNo - The customer's phone number.
      customerCity - The city where the customer is located.
      Returns:
      The newly created `Customer` object.

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a customer's password after verifying their old one.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer.
      oldPassword - The current password.
      newPassword - The new password to set.
      Returns:
      `true` if the password was changed successfully, `false` otherwise.

    • login

      Customer login(String userName, String password)
      Authenticates a customer for login.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the customer.
      password - The password of the customer.
      Returns:
      The `Customer` object if login is successful, `null` otherwise.
